author: ProxV, Inc.
name: jsbundle
description: Simple, clean, and automatic bundling of your Node modules and packages for use in the browser.
keywords: browser require bundle module package static-analysis

scripts.test: find test -name "test*.js" | xargs node_modules/vows/bin/vows && JSBUNDLE_ENV=production bin/jsbundle . > test/fixtures/browser-test.js && "$(which xdg-open || which open)" test/fixtures/browser-test.html
